title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Douglas DC6 - New liveries
description:
After the two updates for the Douglas DC6 it is time for some new liveries. PMDG released new liveries for both the DC6A and DC6B. In total you will get 9 new liveries out of which 2 are for the DC6A and the remaining ones are available for the DC6B.
In this video we will have a brief look at the liveries and how to install them.

If you also want to give the aircraft a try you can download it from the site below:
https://pmdg.com/pmdg-dc-6-for-msfs/
